<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ws_operation"><sys_ws_operation action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><consumes>application/json</consumes><consumes_customized>false</consumes_customized><default_operation_uri/><enforce_acl/><http_method>DELETE</http_method><name>request</name><operation_script><![CDATA[(function process( /*RESTAPIRequest*/ request, /*RESTAPIResponse*/ response) {

    var sys_id = request.pathParams.req_sys_id;
    if (!sys_id) {
        response.setError(new sn_ws_err.BadRequestError("Please provide request sys_id in request"));
        response.setStatus(400);
        return;
    }

    var gr = new GlideRecord("x_1858574_it_reque_it_request");
    gr.addQuery("sys_id", sys_id);
    gr.query();

    if (!gr.hasNext || !gr.next()) {
        response.setError(new sn_ws_err.NotFoundError("No Data with sys_id" + sys_id));
        response.setStatus(404);
    }

    gr.deleteRecord();

	var result=
		"Record" +sys_id+" has been deleted sucessfully";
	
    response.setBody({result});
    response.setStatus(200);

})(request, response);]]></operation_script><operation_uri>/api/x_1858574_it_reque/it_request/request/{req_sys_id}</operation_uri><produces>application/json</produces><produces_customized>false</produces_customized><relative_path>/request/{req_sys_id}</relative_path><request_example/><requires_acl_authorization>true</requires_acl_authorization><requires_authentication>true</requires_authentication><requires_snc_internal_role>true</requires_snc_internal_role><short_description/><sys_class_name>sys_ws_operation</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2025-11-21 07:34:09</sys_created_on><sys_id>efeb525a931df210fd263a6efaba107b</sys_id><sys_mod_count>6</sys_mod_count><sys_name>request</sys_name><sys_package display_value="IT Request" source="x_1858574_it_reque">1602859993193210fd263a6efaba1095</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="IT Request">1602859993193210fd263a6efaba1095</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ws_operation_efeb525a931df210fd263a6efaba107b</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-11-21 07:43:58</sys_updated_on><web_service_definition display_value="IT REQUEST">ed65c61e9359f210fd263a6efaba1042</web_service_definition><web_service_version/></sys_ws_operation></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_ws_operation_0ef66ede935df210fd263a6efaba100a
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ws_operation"><sys_ws_operation action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><consumes>application/json</consumes><consumes_customized>false</consumes_customized><default_operation_uri/><enforce_acl/><http_method>GET</http_method><name>My Request</name><operation_script><![CDATA[(function process( /*RESTAPIRequest*/ request, /*RESTAPIResponse*/ response) {

    var requested_for = request.pathParams.user_sys_id;
    var res = [];
    if (!requested_for) {
        response.setError(new sn_ws_err.BadRequestError("Please provide user sys_id"));
        response.setStatus(400);
    }
    var gr = new GlideRecord("x_1858574_it_reque_it_request");
    gr.addQuery("requested_for", requested_for);
    gr.query();

if(!gr.hasNext()){
	response.setError(new sn_ws_err.NotFoundError("NO Record have been founded"));
	response.setStatus(404);
	return;
}
while(gr.next()){
	var recordObj={
		"sys_id" : gr.getValue("sys_id"),
		"assigned_to":gr.getValue("assigned_to"),
		"item":gr.getValue("item"),
		"quantity":gr.getValue("quantity"),
		"total_cost":gr.getValue("total_cost"),
		"status":gr.getValue("approval"),
	};
	res.push(recordObj);
}
response.setBody(res);
response.setStatus(200);

})(request, response);]]></operation_script><operation_uri>/api/x_1858574_it_reque/it_request/my_request/{user_sys_id}</operation_uri><produces>application/json</produces><produces_customized>false</produces_customized><relative_path>/my_request/{user_sys_id}</relative_path><request_example/><requires_acl_authorization>true</requires_acl_authorization><requires_authentication>true</requires_authentication><requires_snc_internal_role>true</requires_snc_internal_role><short_description/><sys_class_name>sys_ws_operation</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2025-11-21 08:31:41</sys_created_on><sys_id>0ef66ede935df210fd263a6efaba100a</sys_id><sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count><sys_name>My Request</sys_name><sys_package display_value="IT Request" source="x_1858574_it_reque">1602859993193210fd263a6efaba1095</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="IT Request">1602859993193210fd263a6efaba1095</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ws_operation_0ef66ede935df210fd263a6efaba100a</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-11-21 08:33:24</sys_updated_on><web_service_definition display_value="IT REQUEST">ed65c61e9359f210fd263a6efaba1042</web_service_definition><web_service_version/></sys_ws_operation></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>true</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>false</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>x_1858574_it_reque_it_request</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition/><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>Assign Manager User fro Request</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/ ) {
    var userGR = new GlideRecord("sys_user");
    if (userGR.get(current.requested_for)) {
        var managerID = userGR.getValue("manager");
        if (managerID) {
            current.assigned_to = managerID;
        } else {
            current.assigned_to = "6816f79cc0a8016401c5a33be04be441"; //User Id if there is no manager to the user
        }
    }

	/************************************OR******************************************/
	// var manager = current.requested_for.manager;
	// if(!manager){
	// 	current.assigned_to="6816f79cc0a8016401c5a33be04be441";
	// }else{
	// 	current.assigned_to=manager;
	// }

sys_update_xml.name: sys_ws_operation_5760ae52935df210fd263a6efaba1007
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ws_operation"><sys_ws_operation action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><consumes>application/json</consumes><consumes_customized>false</consumes_customized><default_operation_uri/><enforce_acl/><http_method>PUT</http_method><name>request</name><operation_script><![CDATA[(function process( /*RESTAPIRequest*/ request, /*RESTAPIResponse*/ response) {

    /*
	API CALL : To update a Request in table  
	HEADER{
	Request_sys_id: sys_id
	}
	BODY{
	   	 item :sys_id 
   		 quantity :integer
   		 requested_for :sys_id
	}

    */

    var res;
    var data = request.body.data;
    var item = data.item;
    var quantity = data.quantity;
    var requested_for = data.requested_for;

    var sys_id = request.pathParams.req_sys_id;

    if (!sys_id) {
        response.setError(new sn_ws_err.BadRequestError("Request sys_id must be send in header request"));
        response.setStatus(400);
    } else {
        var gr = new GlideRecord("x_1858574_it_reque_it_request");
       gr.addQuery("sys_id",sys_id);
	   gr.query();

	   if(!gr.hasNext() || ! gr.next()){
		    response.setError(new sn_ws_err.NotFoundError(`no request found with sys_id ${sys_id}`));
        response.setStatus(404);
	   }else{
		if(item) {gr.item=item;}
		if(quantity){gr.quantity=quantity;}
		if(requested_for){gr.requested_for=requested_for;}
		gr.update();
	   }

      
        res = {
            "id": gr.sys_id,
            "requested for": gr.requested_for,
            "total cost": gr.total_cost
        };
        response.setStatus(201);
        response.setBody(res);

    }
})(request, response);]]></operation_script><operation_uri>/api/x_1858574_it_reque/it_request/request/{req_sys_id}</operation_uri><produces>application/json</produces><produces_customized>false</produces_customized><relative_path>/request/{req_sys_id}</relative_path><request_example/><requires_acl_authorization>true</requires_acl_authorization><requires_authentication>true</requires_authentication><requires_snc_internal_role>true</requires_snc_internal_role><short_description/><sys_class_name>sys_ws_operation</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2025-11-21 07:49:54</sys_created_on><sys_id>5760ae52935df210fd263a6efaba1007</sys_id><sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count><sys_name>request</sys_name><sys_package display_value="IT Request" source="x_1858574_it_reque">1602859993193210fd263a6efaba1095</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="IT Request">1602859993193210fd263a6efaba1095</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ws_operation_5760ae52935df210fd263a6efaba1007</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-11-21 08:10:27</sys_updated_on><web_service_definition display_value="IT REQUEST">ed65c61e9359f210fd263a6efaba1042</web_service_definition><web_service_version/></sys_ws_operation></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_ws_operation_5ad5c65e9359f210fd263a6efaba104a
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ws_operation"><sys_ws_operation action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><consumes>application/json</consumes><consumes_customized>false</consumes_customized><default_operation_uri/><enforce_acl/><http_method>POST</http_method><name>request</name><operation_script><![CDATA[(function process( /*RESTAPIRequest*/ request, /*RESTAPIResponse*/ response) {

    /*
	API CALL : To create a new Request 
	BODY{
	   	 item :sys_id 
   		 quantity :integer
   		 opened_by : sys_id
   		 requested_for :sys_id
	}

    */

    var res;
    var data = request.body.data;
	var item=data.item ;
	var quantity=data.quantity;
	var opened_by=data.opened_by;
	var requested_for = data.requested_for;

    if (!item || !quantity || !opened_by || !requested_for) {
        response.setStatus(400);
        response.setBody("messing data in request body");
    } else {
        var gr = new GlideRecord("x_1858574_it_reque_it_request");
		gr.initialize();
		gr.item=data.item;
		gr.quantity=quantity;
		gr.opened_by=opened_by;
		gr.requested_for=requested_for;

		gr.insert();
		res={
			"id" :gr.sys_id,
			"requested for" :gr.requested_for,
			"total cost": gr.total_cost
		};
		response.setStatus(201);
		response.setBody(res);

    }
})(request, response);]]></operation_script><operation_uri>/api/x_1858574_it_reque/it_request/request</operation_uri><produces>application/json</produces><produces_customized>false</produces_customized><relative_path>/request</relative_path><request_example/><requires_acl_authorization>true</requires_acl_authorization><requires_authentication>true</requires_authentication><requires_snc_internal_role>true</requires_snc_internal_role><short_description/><sys_class_name>sys_ws_operation</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2025-11-21 06:18:24</sys_created_on><sys_id>5ad5c65e9359f210fd263a6efaba104a</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>request</sys_name><sys_package display_value="IT Request" source="x_1858574_it_reque">1602859993193210fd263a6efaba1095</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="IT Request">1602859993193210fd263a6efaba1095</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ws_operation_5ad5c65e9359f210fd263a6efaba104a</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-11-21 08:15:04</sys_updated_on><web_service_definition display_value="IT REQUEST">ed65c61e9359f210fd263a6efaba1042</web_service_definition><web_service_version/></sys_ws_operation></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="DELETE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>true</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>false</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>x_1858574_it_reque_it_request</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition/><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>Assign Manager User For Request</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/ ) {


    var userGR = new GlideRecord("sys_user");
    if (userGR.get(current.requested_for)) {
        var managerID = userGR.getValue("manager");
        if (managerID) {
            current.assigned_to = managerID;
			current.quantity=100;
        } else {
            // fallback user sys_id
			current.quantity=200;
            current.assigned_to = "6816f79cc0a8016401c5a33be04be441";
        }
    }

sys_update_xml.name: sys_ws_operation_7f6e4a9e9399f210fd263a6efaba1066
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ws_operation"><sys_ws_operation action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><consumes>application/json</consumes><consumes_customized>false</consumes_customized><default_operation_uri/><enforce_acl/><http_method>GET</http_method><name>request</name><operation_script><![CDATA[(function process( /*RESTAPIRequest*/ request, /*RESTAPIResponse*/ response) {

    var sys_id = request.pathParams.req_sys_id

    if (!sys_id) {
        response.setError(new sn_ws_err.NotFoundError("Request Sys_id not provided"));
        response.setStatus(400);
        return;
    }
    var gr = new GlideRecord("x_1858574_it_reque_it_request");
    gr.addQuery("sys_id", sys_id);
    gr.query();

    if (!gr.hasNext()|| !gr.next()) {
        response.setError(new sn_ws_err.NotFoundError("No Request found"));
        response.setStatus(404);
        return;
    }
	
    var res = {
        "sys_id": sys_id,
        "Opened by": gr.getValue("opened_by"),
        "Requested_for": gr.getValue("requested_for"),
        "Item": gr.getValue("item"),
        "Quantity": gr.getValue("quantity"),
        "Total Cost": gr.getValue("total_cost"),
        "Status": gr.getValue("approval")
    };
    response.setStatus(200);
    response.setBody(res);
	
})(request, response);]]></operation_script><operation_uri>/api/x_1858574_it_reque/it_request/request/{req_sys_id}</operation_uri><produces>application/json</produces><produces_customized>false</produces_customized><relative_path>/request/{req_sys_id}</relative_path><request_example/><requires_acl_authorization>true</requires_acl_authorization><requires_authentication>true</requires_authentication><requires_snc_internal_role>true</requires_snc_internal_role><short_description/><sys_class_name>sys_ws_operation</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2025-11-21 06:38:06</sys_created_on><sys_id>7f6e4a9e9399f210fd263a6efaba1066</sys_id><sys_mod_count>9</sys_mod_count><sys_name>request</sys_name><sys_package display_value="IT Request" source="x_1858574_it_reque">1602859993193210fd263a6efaba1095</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="IT Request">1602859993193210fd263a6efaba1095</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ws_operation_7f6e4a9e9399f210fd263a6efaba1066</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-11-21 07:24:41</sys_updated_on><web_service_definition display_value="IT REQUEST">ed65c61e9359f210fd263a6efaba1042</web_service_definition><web_service_version/></sys_ws_operation></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_include_656a855d93593210fd263a6efaba1082
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>x_1858574_it_reque.getItemsData</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>true</client_callable><description/><mobile_callable>false</mobile_callable><name>getItemsData</name><sandbox_callable>false</sandbox_callable><script><![CDATA[var getItemsData = Class.create();
getItemsData.prototype = Object.extendsObject(global.AbstractAjaxProcessor, {
    getItemPrice: function() {
        var itemSysId = this.getParameter('itemSysId');
        var gr = new GlideRecord('x_1858574_it_reque_items');
        if (gr.get(itemSysId)) {
            return gr.getValue('price');
        }
    },
    isAvilable: function() {
        var itemSysId = this.getParameter('itemSysId');
        var neededQuantity = Number(this.getParameter('neededQuantity'));
        var gr = new GlideRecord('x_1858574_it_reque_items');
        if (gr.get(itemSysId)) {
            var dbQuantity = Number(gr.getValue('available_quantity'));
            if (neededQuantity > dbQuantity)
                return false;
            else
                return true;

        }
    },
    type: 'getItemsData'
});]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2025-11-17 23:09:57</sys_created_on><sys_id>656a855d93593210fd263a6efaba1082</sys_id><sys_mod_count>8</sys_mod_count><sys_name>getItemsData</sys_name><sys_package display_value="IT Request" source="x_1858574_it_reque">1602859993193210fd263a6efaba1095</sys_package><sys_policy>read</sys_policy><sys_scope display_value="IT Request">1602859993193210fd263a6efaba1095</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_656a855d93593210fd263a6efaba1082</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-11-18 00:17:42</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>
